title: Trying to produce augmented datasets
body:
When I run the program for producing augmented dataset following https://github.com/xavierpuigf/virtualhome#script-augmentation
cd dataset_utils
python augment_dataset_locations.py

However,
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "augment_dataset_locations.py", line 239, in augment_dataset({}, programs)
File "augment_dataset_locations.py", line 188, in augment_dataset {})
File "../simulation/evolving_graph/check_programs.py", line 226, in check_script
graph_dict = utils.load_graph_dict(graph_path)
File "../simulation/evolving_graph/utils.py", line 82, in load_graph_dict
with open(file_name) as f:
FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '../example_graphs/TrimmedTestScene2_graph.json'

I then download http://virtual-home.org/release/programs/augment_location.zip but I don't know which file should be TrimmedTestScene2_graph.json.
